item.description: Projects Welcome to my projects page! Here you’ll find a showcase of my diverse creations, spanning various technologies and disciplines, each designed to provide engaging experiences for a wide range of audiences. Mario-Inspired Platformer Duration: March 2023 - Present Technologies: 6502 Assembly NES Architecture Vivi’s Dreamland Adventure is a Mario like platformer game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) using 6502 Assembly language and adhering to the classic NES architecture.
